name: Island Xtreme Stunts [GBA]
description:
Island Xtreme Stunts is a sports, racing and arcade game developed by Silicon Dreams Studio and Silicon Dreams Studios. It was originally released in 2002. Lego Interactive published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Island Xtreme Stunts on Game Boy Advance, PlayStation 2 and PC.
